main: ^Would you like to learn about how to help the forest?
yes: ^Great! You can start by only cutting trees when you need to.
^The lumberjack always wants more lumber, but you need to find a balance.
no: ^I understand, but remember that the health of the forest is important!
explanation: ^Yes, the town needs lumbar to survive...
^...but they also need the forest to survive.
^We need to take good care of it for the good of the environment and for ourselves.
end: ^Come to me for more ways on how to help the forest!
